subject: AI & Agents
title: 3D Generation: Objects from Text
description: A micro-lesson that makes 3D Generation: Objects from Text usable.

hook.text: 'A medieval sword with a dragon-head pommel.' A 3D model rotates on screen.

buildup.text: 3D generation creates meshes, point clouds, or NeRFs from text or image prompts.

discovery.text: Score distillation sampling uses a 2D diffusion model to guide 3D shape optimization.

twist.text: Generated 3D models often have artifacts: holes, flat textures, and the 'Janus problem' (multi-faced).

climax.text: Instant3D and TripoSR generate usable 3D assets in under a minute from a single image.

quiz.question: What is the Janus problem in 3D generation?
options: Objects having multiple faces or duplicate features
